title: @Riot Badge but no Badge
body:
Dear Riot,

I just started a match and by accident found out that I had gotten the yellow honor badge  (whichever one that is) in the loading screen ... which is Cool AF!
However, I had not received any notification about getting a badge... nor can I see that I have one on my profile page. 
Where is this supposed to show outside of the loading screen?

I saw videos that in the old client you received it like a gift, basically being praised into the heavens... and now there is not even a simple notification like "Yo, you got the yellow honor badge..."

Kind regards,
H33P

replies.body:
Thanks =D

That is unfortunate, but it is not the end of the world :)
On the other hand, Riot will probably create an amazing experience when they craft their new honor system :)
